text-color-brand.$description: Brand-colored text for emphasis and highlights (e.g., highlighted keywords, brand callouts, promotional text). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-brand-light-only.$description: Brand text color in light mode, neutral white in dark mode (e.g., subtle brand accents that shouldn't be vibrant in dark). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-primary.$description: Primary text color for static content like body copy and labels (e.g., article text, titles, form labels). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-secondary.$description: Secondary text color for static supporting content (e.g., captions, timestamps, meta information, descriptions). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-tertiary.$description: Tertiary text color for static de-emphasized content (e.g., placeholder text, helper text, footnotes). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

kicker-text-color.$description: Kicker text color for category labels above headlines on standard surface backgrounds. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

headline-text-color.$description: Headline text color for article titles and major headings. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-on-image.$description: Text color for content overlaid on images, mode-independent (e.g., image captions, teaser headlines on photos). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

text-color-secondary-on-dark.$description: Secondary text on dark solid surfaces, mode-independent. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

text-color-primary-on-light.$description: Primary text on light solid surfaces, mode-independent (e.g., text on light colored backgrounds). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

kicker-text-color-on-dark.$description: Applied to kicker or meta text on dark colored backgrounds to maintain high legibility. Behavior: Constant — always uses semi-transparent white for consistent readability.

kicker-text-color-on-light.$description: Used for kicker text placed on bright or light colored backgrounds. Ensures balanced contrast without harsh visual dominance. Behavior: Constant — remains semi-transparent black across both modes.

text-color-primary-on-dark.$description: Primary text on dark solid surfaces, mode-independent (e.g., button labels on dark buttons). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

text-color-secondary-on-light.$description: Secondary text on light solid surfaces, mode-independent (e.g., secondary text on light colored backgrounds). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

text-color-idle.$description: Default text color for interactive/clickable elements in idle state (e.g., text links, navigation items, clickable labels). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-disabled.$description: Text color for disabled elements (e.g., inactive button labels, disabled input text/links). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-hover.$description: Text color for interactive/clickable elements on hover (e.g., link hover, navigation item hover). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-active.$description: Text color for interactive/clickable elements in active or visited state (e.g., visited links, active navigation item, current page). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

text-color-primary-inverse.$description: Primary static text on inverted/contrast backgrounds (e.g., body text in dark sections, footer copy). Not for interactive elements. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

text-color-secondary-inverse.$description: Secondary static text on inverted/contrast backgrounds (e.g., meta info in dark sections). Not for interactive elements. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

text-color-inverse-high-contrast.$description: High contrast inverse text for maximum readability on inverted surfaces (e.g., white text on dark buttons). Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values.

text-color-success.$description: Success text color for confirmation messages and positive feedback. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

text-color-error.$description: Error text color for error messages and validation feedback. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

text-color-warning.$description: Warning text color for caution messages and alerts. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-primary.$description: Primary background color for main surfaces and page backgrounds (e.g., page background, primary containers). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific in dark mode.

bg-color-disabled.$description: Background color for disabled interactive elements (e.g., inactive buttons, disabled inputs). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-secondary.$description: Secondary background for elevated containers (e.g., cards on primary background, sidebar panels). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-primary-const-dark.$description: Dark background that remains constant regardless of color mode (e.g. media containers). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-quaternary.$description: Quaternary background for fourth-level elements (e.g., pressed states, nested backgrounds). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-tertiary.$description: Tertiary background for third-level containers (e.g., input fields, nested cards, hover states). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-primary-const-light.$description: Light background that remains constant regardless of color mode (e.g., fixed white elements). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-quintenary.$description: Quintenary background for fifth-level elements and high-contrast utility surfaces. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-brand-light-only.$description: Brand background in light mode, neutral white in dark mode (e.g., accent elements that shouldn't be vibrant in dark). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-brand-solid.$description: Solid brand background for primary CTAs and brand-emphasized elements (e.g., primary buttons, badges). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-brand-solid-hover.$description: Solid brand background for hover interactions (e.g., CTA button hover). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-brand-solid-active.$description: Solid brand background for active/pressed state (e.g., CTA button pressed). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-brand-tint.$description: Subtle brand tint background for soft brand presence (e.g., notification backgrounds, selected list items). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-brand-tint-hover.$description: Subtle brand tint background for hover state (e.g., secondary button hover). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-primary-inverse.$description: nverted primary background for contrast sections (e.g., dark header on light page, footer). Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

bg-color-tertiary-inverse.$description: Inverted tertiary background for nested contrast elements (e.g., code blocks, nested menus). Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

bg-color-quaternary-inverse.$description: Inverted quaternary background for subtle contrast distinctions. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

bg-color-secondary-inverse.$description: Inverted secondary background for elevated contrast elements (e.g., tooltips, popovers). Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

bg-color-quintenary-inverse.$description: Inverted quintenary background for high-contrast inverse elements. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

bg-color-success-tint.$description: Success feedback background for positive states (e.g., success message background, validated field). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-success-solid.$description: Solid success background for positive actions (e.g., confirm button, success badge). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

bg-color-success-solid-hover.$description: Solid success background for hover state (e.g., confirm button hover). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

bg-color-success-tint-hover.$description: Success feedback background for hover state (e.g., success notification hover). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-success-solid-active.$description: Solid success background for active/pressed state (e.g., confirm button pressed). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

bg-color-tertiary-gradient-stop.$description: Gradient stop color for tertiary background transitions. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

bg-color-primary-gradient-stop.$description: Gradient stop color for primary background fade effects (e.g., scroll shadows, content fade-outs). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-secondary-gradient-stop.$description: Gradient stop color for secondary background transitions. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

overlay-scrim-black-const.$description: A semi-transparent black overlay used to dim background content when modals, drawers, or dialogs are active. Identical opacity and tone in both Light and Dark mode to ensure consistent overlay depth.

overlay-scrim-white-const.$description: A semi-transparent white overlay used to brighten or fade background layers, often applied behind bottom sheets or temporary panels. Behavior: Constant — same opacity level across modes to preserve uniform layering behavior.

bg-color-error-tint.$description: Error feedback background for error states (e.g., error message background, invalid field highlight). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-error-tint-hover.$description: Error feedback background for hover state (e.g., error notification hover). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-error-solid.$description: Solid error background for critical actions (e.g., delete button, error badge). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

bg-color-error-solid-hover.$description: Solid error background for hover state (e.g., destructive button hover). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

bg-color-warning-tint.$description: Warning feedback background for caution states (e.g., warning banner, attention indicators). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-warning-tint-hover.$description: Warning feedback background for hover state. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

bg-color-warning-solid.$description: Solid warning background for caution indicators (e.g., warning badge, alert background). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

bg-color-warning-solid-hover.$description: Solid warning background for hover state. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

border-color-default.$description: Default border color for static containers and separators (e.g., card borders, section dividers). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-subtle.$description: Subtle low-contrast border for soft static separations (e.g., list separators, subtle dividers). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-extra-strong.$description: Extra strong border for maximum static contrast (e.g., critical sections, strong separations). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-strong.$description: Strong border for static emphasis (e.g., highlighted sections, important containers). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-subtle-on-dark.$description: Subtle border on dark solid backgrounds (e.g., subtle dividers on dark UI). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-default-on-dark.$description: Default border on dark solid backgrounds. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-subtle-on-light.$description: Subtle border on light solid backgrounds. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-default-on-light.$description: Default border on light solid backgrounds. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-success.$description: Success border for valid states (e.g., validated input, successful upload). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

border-color-error.$description: Error border for invalid states (e.g., form validation error, required field indicator). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

border-color-warning.$description: Warning border for caution states (e.g., field warning, attention required). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

border-color-disabled.$description: Border color for disabled elements (e.g., disabled input borders, inactive containers). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-selected.$description: Border for selected elements (e.g., selected checkbox, active tab indicator). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-active.$description: Border for active elements (e.g., active tab indicator). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-idle.$description: Default border color for interactive elements in idle state (e.g., input fields, buttons, selectable items). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-default-inverse.$description: Default border on inverted surfaces. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

border-color-subtle-inverse.$description: Subtle border on inverted surfaces (e.g., subtle separators in dark sections). Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

border-color-brand.$description: Brand-colored border for emphasis (e.g., active tabs, selected items, brand highlights). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-brand-light-only.$description: Brand border in light mode, neutral white in dark mode (e.g., accent borders that shouldn't be vibrant in dark). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-brand-const.$description: Brand border that remains constant regardless of color mode. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

border-color-no-contrast.$description: Zero-contrast border matching surface color (e.g., invisible borders for layout, spacing helpers). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-idle.$description: Default icon color for interactive/clickable icons in idle state (e.g., icon buttons, navigation icons, action icons). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-disabled.$description: Icon color for disabled elements (e.g., inactive button icons, disabled controls). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-hover.$description: Icon color for interactive/clickable icons on hover (e.g., icon button hover, navigation icon hover). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-active.$description: Icon color for interactive/clickable icons in active or selected state (e.g., active navigation, selected action). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-secondary-on-light.$description: Secondary icon on light solid surfaces. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

icon-color-primary-on-dark.$description: Primary icon on dark solid surfaces (e.g., icons on dark buttons, player controls). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

icon-color-secondary-on-dark.$description: Secondary icon on dark solid surfaces. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

icon-color-primary-on-light.$description: Primary icon on light solid surfaces. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

icon-color-const-on-image.$description: Icon color for elements overlaid on images (e.g., play button on video thumbnail). Mode-independent. Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

icon-color-success.$description: Success icon color for success indicators (e.g., checkmark icon, completion indicator). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

icon-color-error.$description: Error icon color for error indicators (e.g., error badge icon, validation error icon). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

icon-color-warning.$description: Warning icon color for caution indicators (e.g., warning triangle, alert icon). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode.

icon-color-brand.$description: Brand-colored icon for emphasis (e.g., featured icons, brand indicators). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-brand-light-only.$description: Brand icon color in light mode, neutral white in dark mode. Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-primary.$description: Primary icon color for static/decorative icons (e.g., section icons, illustrative icons, status indicators). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-secondary.$description: Secondary icon color for static supporting icons (e.g., metadata icons, decorative icons, list markers). Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-tertiary.$description: Tertiary icon color for static de-emphasized icons (e.g., subtle indicators, background icons).  Behavior: Dynamic — adapts between light and dark mode. Brand-specific.

icon-color-primary-inverse.$description: Primary icon on inverted/contrast backgrounds. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

icon-color-secondary-inverse.$description: Secondary icon on inverted/contrast backgrounds. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values. Brand-specific.

icon-color-inverse-high-contrast.$description: High contrast inverse icon for maximum visibility on inverted surfaces. Behavior: Inverted — swaps light and dark values.

layer-opacity-05.$description: Layer opacity value at 5% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-10.$description: Layer opacity value at 10% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-20.$description: Layer opacity value at 20% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-30.$description: Layer opacity value at 30% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-40.$description: Layer opacity value at 40% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-50.$description: Layer opacity value at 50% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-60.$description: Layer opacity value at 60% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-70.$description: Layer opacity value at 70% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-80.$description: Layer opacity value at 80% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-90.$description: Layer opacity value at 90% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-100.$description: Layer opacity value at 100% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

layer-opacity-00.$description: Layer opacity value at 00% for transparency effects (e.g., overlays, fade effects). Behavior: Static — same value in light and dark mode.

breadcrumb-text-color-idle.$description: Use this token on breadcrumbs that are in their default idle state. This token changes color between light and dark modes. L:035 / D:096

breadcrumb-text-color-hover.$description: Use this token on breadcrumbs that the user's pointer is hovering on or clicked on. This token changes color between light and dark modes. L:015 / D:100

menu-scrolled-bg-gradient-color.$description: Used on a thin part at the top of header in navigation menu.

button-primary-neutral-bg-color-idle.$description: Use this variable on the neutral color primary button. Tone changes between light and dark mode. Light mode Bild & SpoBi: Tone 015 ; Dark mode Bild & SpoBi: Tone 100

button-disabled-bg-color.$description: Use this variable on the neutral color primary button. Tone changes between light and dark mode. Light mode Bild & SpoBi: Tone 015 ; Dark mode Bild & SpoBi: Tone 100

button-disabled-border-color.$description: Use this variable on the neutral color primary button. Tone changes between light and dark mode. Light mode Bild & SpoBi: Tone 015 ; Dark mode Bild & SpoBi: Tone 100

selection-border-color.$description: Checkboxes and Radio buttons use this variable for their border.

gallery-pagination-element-active-opacit.$description: Use this on gallery slider pagination elements. This can also be applied to hover states of those elements.

scroll-bar-track-bg-color.$description: Used as the background surface color scroll bars. Found on components that vertically or horizontally stack elements.

scroll-bar-thumb-bg-color.$description: Use on the scroll bar interactive element which shows where the scroll view is positioned inside the full extent of the scrolling space.

teaser-hover-opacity.$description: When users hover over graphical teasers the image reduces opacity to 80%.

slider-button-opacity.$description: When users hover on gallery slider buttons the opacity changes to 90%.

slider-track-bg-color.$description: This variable is used on audio player slider bars. It references a pure white with 35% opacity.

vid-player-control-buttons-bg-hover-colo.$description: This variable is used for hover states of video player control buttons. This variable has possibly been deprecated as of Q4 2025.
